snippet.title: Pikmin 3 Hack - Extra Side of Stories Release Trailer! [Pikmin 20th Anniversary]
snippet.description:
Pikmin 3: Extra Side of Stories is a non profit expansion modpack that can only be played through a legal obtained copy of Nintendo's Pikmin 3. for Wii U. Switch version will come in the future.
Please make sure your game is FULLY updated, including DLC! 

DOWNLOAD (FOR CEMU EMULATOR):
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1__4eEcvK1UYcpxIpsfgeAnQbAUN_Hwmd/view?usp=sharing
https://sites.google.com/view/mrtongwah/home
DOWNLOAD (FOR PLAYING ON WII U): 
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Ov84hyvG7YA-H3MzYzriDA1w3XKH3CVt/view?usp=sharing
https://sites.google.com/view/mrtongwah/home

IMPORTANT!!!!:
The Custom Map: Low Tide Island is not compatible for console at this time, but we are working to trying to fix this issue ASAP. And will update the download when we figure out. For now, you can still enjoy 23 out of the 25 extra missions for Wii U. The Custom Map will still work perfectly on Emulator.

EXTRA MUSIC TRACKS: 
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1fxi_wohtenZIWR8k0cINvwqQBfPzrITt/view?usp=sharing
A Read me is provided to how to install these.

A Huge Thanks to everyone here that helped out with this hack.
-QuoteBalrog (Taught me the basics of how to hack Wii U Games)
-LazyBoii (Creating the Coconut, Beehive, Tomato, and Screw Piles custom treasures, Hocotate Ship, and creating the Low Tide Island custom map)
-LazyBoii and Leafixen (Testing the hack on Cemu)
-Jimble&QuoteBalrog (Play testing the hack on Wii U)
-Yoshi2 (Creating the Pikmin 3 Gen and Path Editor)
-KillzXGaming (Creating Switch-Toolbox)
-Turtle&Yoshi2 (Creating the code for the MP4 to H264 converter)
-Lazyboii and Ryman (Allowing me to use Snow Bulborb textures and Snowy Formidable Oak map)
-Nieton (Fixing the Wollywog params)
-ElCamo (Fixing Emperor Bulblax params)
-Niment (Creating the President model over Charlie)
-Waffles (Providing the individual Valley of Repose mixes to be made into Pikmin 3)
